utilities

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the robot systems.
    Author:
    fauzi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot(MyJoystick joytick) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getEncoderLeftDistance()
      Returns the distance the left encoder has traveled.
      double getEncoderRightDistance()
      Returns the distance the right encoder has traveled.
      double getEncoderShooter()
      Returns the rate of the shooter.
      boolean getFeederStatus()
      Gets the feeder status, true means active.
      double getShooterSpeed()
      Get the speed of the shooter.
      void resetEncoders() 
      void run()
      Runs the robot code, as in Drive, Shooter.
      void setDriveSpeed(double dLeft, double dRight)
      Set the speed of the left and right motors, values allowed are -1 to 1.
      void setFeeder(boolean bStatus)
      Sets the feeder to true or false.
      void setShooter(double dSpeed)
      Sets the shooter to the specified speed.
      void stopRobot()
      Stops the robot and sets everything to false or zero, does not disable the ability to use it though.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
